meta.title: AvenEzer — Home
meta.description: AvenEzer is an international digital platform for businesses, Avers and communities.

hero.title: AvenEzer — an ecosystem of business, partnership and support
hero.subtitle: AvenEzer is a Canadian company building an international digital platform for businesses and non-profit organisations. The name means ‘stone of help’ — a symbol of shared strength and responsibility. We create an environment where business growth is combined with social value.

platformToday.title: The platform today
paragraphs: At the moment, AvenEzer operates as an MVP web platform.
The MVP allows you to:
bullets: create and view business profiles,
explore the platform’s functionality,
join the ecosystem at an early stage,
test approaches and shape the future product structure.

mvpNote.title: Note about the MVP
paragraphs: The MVP is an initial version of the platform and may change as the product evolves.

nextStage.title: Next stage
paragraphs: The next stage of AvenEzer’s development is a mobile app that expands access and makes the experience more convenient for businesses and users.
The mobile app is in planning and development. Features and launch timelines are defined gradually.

business.title: For businesses
paragraphs: AvenEzer helps local and international businesses become visible,
attract customers, and prepare for a full presence in the mobile app.

avers.title: For Avers (platform partners)
paragraphs: An Aver is an AvenEzer partner who brings businesses into the platform and the mobile app,
helps the ecosystem grow, and receives a reward for their contribution.
Avers are a key link between the platform and businesses in cities and countries.

users.title: For users
paragraphs: Users get convenient access to verified businesses, services and offers
within the platform and the future mobile app.

nonprofit.title: For nonprofits and social initiatives
paragraphs: In the future, AvenEzer plans to support nonprofit organizations and social projects,
giving them visibility, access to the community, and a place in a global ecosystem of trust.

ecosystem.title: The AvenEzer ecosystem
paragraphs: AvenEzer is an ecosystem where businesses gain visibility,
Avers get opportunities for growth and income,
users get convenient access to services,
and nonprofits gain a space for support and collaboration.

developmentNote.title: Note
paragraphs: Some platform features are under development and will be available in future versions.

meta.title: AvenEzer — About
meta.description: About AvenEzer: mission, development approach, and the principles behind building an international digital ecosystem.

hero.title: About the company
hero.subtitle: AvenEzer is evolving as an international digital ecosystem that connects businesses, Aver partners and users within a single structure — with a focus on trust, clear rules, and gradual development.

aboutCompany.title: About the company
paragraphs: We are building a technology environment where businesses gain visibility and a digital presence,
Avers help the ecosystem grow as independent partners,
and users get access to services and offers within the platform and the future mobile app.

mission.title: AvenEzer mission
paragraphs: Our mission is to build a modern platform that simplifies interactions between businesses and users,
and creates the foundation for a global ecosystem of trust and collaboration.

approach.title: Development approach
paragraphs: AvenEzer evolves step by step. We focus on building a strong foundation rather than making loud promises.
bullets: stable architecture and clear user logic,
defined roles and transparent rules within the ecosystem,
scalability across cities, countries and communities,
long-term value for platform participants.

meta.title: AvenEzer — FAQ
meta.description: Answers to common questions about AvenEzer, the Aver Program, the AvenEzer app, and Aver School.

hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Key information about the AvenEzer platform, the Aver Program, and the AvenEzer app in clear and concise answers.

bullets: An Aver is not a company employee.

items.q: How is the AvenEzer app different from Google Maps?
a: The AvenEzer app is not just a map. It is an ecosystem that connects businesses, Aver partners, users, communities, and social initiatives.
AvenEzer plans to support nonprofits and social initiatives in future versions of the platform and the AvenEzer app.
Nonprofit organizations will be able to gain visibility and become part of a global ecosystem of trust.

items.q: Is AvenEzer only a commercial project?
a: No. AvenEzer combines a business model with a social and community mission.

items.q: In which countries does AvenEzer operate?
a: AvenEzer has an international format and is designed to operate across different countries and cities.
No. Some features are still in development and will be added in upcoming versions of the platform and the AvenEzer app.
An Aver is an independent partner of AvenEzer Inc., a Canadian corporation building an international digital ecosystem for businesses, users, and communities.
Avers help businesses join the AvenEzer platform and prepare for presence in the AvenEzer app, contributing to ecosystem growth.
The Aver Program is AvenEzer Inc.'s partner program that enables participation in platform development, business onboarding, and earning rewards for contribution.
The Aver Program is not employment and not a traditional sales model.
An Aver introduces businesses to AvenEzer, explains platform and app opportunities, helps businesses join the ecosystem, and supports local growth.
Avers are a key link between the platform and local businesses.

items.q: Can you earn in the Aver Program?
a: Yes. Avers receive rewards for bringing businesses and participating in AvenEzer platform growth.
The reward format depends on partner program terms and the platform development stage.

items.q: Is an Aver a company employee?
a: No. An Aver is an independent partner, not an employee of AvenEzer Inc.
bullets: No labor employment relationship with the company.
Independent choice of participation format.
No mandatory plans or quotas.

items.q: Is the Aver Program network marketing (MLM)?
a: No. The Aver Program is a partner-based digital program, not a multi-level marketing (MLM) system.
Avers do not sell products and do not buy mandatory participation packages.

items.q: Who is the Aver Program for?
a: The Aver Program is suitable for people in different countries and cities who have local business contacts, want to help build a digital platform, prefer a flexible partner format, and want to join an international project early.

items.q: In which countries can you become an Aver?
a: The Aver Program has an international format. Avers can join from different countries and develop the platform locally.

items.q: How can you become an Aver?
a: To become an Aver: learn about the AvenEzer platform, submit an application to join the Aver Program, receive materials and guidance, and start onboarding businesses into the AvenEzer ecosystem.

items.q: Aver Program and the AvenEzer app
a: Avers play an important role in preparing businesses for presence in the AvenEzer app.
As the platform evolves, opportunities for Avers will expand along with AvenEzer app functionality.
Yes. Aver partners receive training that helps them understand the AvenEzer platform, the Aver role, and principles of working with businesses.
Aver School is a training program for Aver partners created by AvenEzer Inc.
bullets: helps understand how the AvenEzer platform works,
teaches how to present the platform to businesses correctly,
explains the role of an Aver in the ecosystem,
builds confident and systematic actions even without prior experience.

items.q: Do you need sales or marketing experience?
a: No. Aver School is designed so people without sales, marketing, or IT experience can learn clearly and step by step.
Training is step-by-step and includes introduction to the platform and app, basic business communication principles, practical startup recommendations, learning materials, and team support.
Access to Aver School is provided after joining the Aver Program. Training is online and can be completed at a convenient pace.
After completing training, an Aver understands how the AvenEzer ecosystem works, knows how to onboard businesses, and can start practical participation in platform growth in their city or country.

hero.title: AvenEzer MVP web platform
hero.subtitle: The MVP is the first working version of AvenEzer. It is built to test the approach, structure, and interactions within the ecosystem — without overpromising and with a focus on gradual development.

purpose.title: MVP purpose
paragraphs: The MVP helps establish the foundation of the platform: structure, user logic, and rules of interaction between participants.
MVP functionality may change or be expanded as the platform evolves.

how.title: How to use the platform
paragraphs: The platform is available for businesses and users who want to explore AvenEzer and join at an early stage.
bullets: browse business profiles and the basic catalog structure,
explore the platform’s capabilities,
use the available functionality according to the established rules.
